text: nasee[1] (maheenon ko aage-peechhe karana) kufr (adharm) mein adhikta hai. isase kaafir kuphath kiye jaate hain. ek hee maheene ko ek varsh haî€¼laal (vaidh) kar dete hain tatha usee ko doosare varsh haî€¼raam (avaidh) kar dete hain. taaki allaah ne sammaanit maheenon kee jo ginatee nishchit kar dee hai, use apanee ginatee ke anusaar karake, avaidh maheenon ko vaidh kar len. unake lie unake kukarm sundar bana diye gaye hain aur allaah kaafiron ko supath nahin darshaata
